sql.t_moni_res_type_selectAll: SELECT c_id AS modelId, c_tree_node_id AS id, c_tree_node_id AS pId, c_name AS name, c_icon AS icon, null AS isMain, null AS resTypeId, c_is_custom AS isCustom FROM t_moni_res_type
sql.t_moni_res_type_delete: DELETE FROM t_moni_res_type WHERE c_id in (?)
sql.t_moni_model_base_select_by_ismain: SELECT c_id AS modelId, null AS id, c_tree_node_id AS pId, c_name AS name, null AS icon, c_is_main AS isMain, c_res_type_id AS resTypeId, c_is_custom AS isCustom FROM t_moni_model_base WHERE c_is_main = ?
sql.t_moni_model_base_select_by_mainmodelid: SELECT c_id AS modelId, null AS id, null AS pId, c_name AS name, null AS icon, c_is_main AS isMain, c_res_type_id AS resTypeId, c_is_custom AS isCustom FROM t_moni_model_base WHERE c_main_model_id = ?
sql.t_moni_model_base_select_by_id: SELECT mb.c_id,mb.c_name,mb.c_res_type_id,mb.c_desc,mb.c_is_snmp,mb.c_plugin_id,mb.c_main_model_id,mb.c_tree_node_id,mb.c_is_main,rt.c_name AS resTypeName,mb2.c_name AS mainResModelName, mb.c_is_custom FROM t_moni_model_base mb LEFT JOIN t_moni_model_base mb2 ON mb.c_main_model_id = mb2.c_id LEFT JOIN t_moni_res_type rt ON mb.c_res_type_id = rt.c_id WHERE mb.c_id = ?
sql.t_moni_model_base_delete: DELETE FROM t_moni_model_base WHERE c_id in (?)
sql.t_moni_model_base_select_by_ids: SELECT * FROM t_moni_model_base WHERE c_id in (?)
sql.t_moni_model_base_select_plugin: SELECT DISTINCT c_plugin_id FROM t_moni_model_base WHERE c_plugin_id != '' ORDER BY c_plugin_id ASC
sql.t_moni_metric_base.select: SELECT metric.c_id AS metricId,metric.c_name AS metricName,metric.c_unit AS metricUnit,metric.c_data_type AS dataType,metric.c_metric_type AS metricType,metric.c_desc AS metricDesc,metric.c_is_custom AS isCustom,metric.c_user_id as metricUser,grouprel.c_metric_group_id AS groupRelId,grouprel.c_metric_id AS metricId,group_concat(mgroup.c_name) AS groupName,mgroup.c_id AS groupId FROM t_moni_metric_base AS metric,t_moni_metric_group_rel AS grouprel,t_moni_metric_group AS mgroup WHERE  metric.c_id = grouprel.c_metric_id AND mgroup.c_id = grouprel.c_metric_group_id GROUP BY metric.c_id;
sql.t_moni_metric_group_rel.delete: DELETE FROM t_moni_metric_group_rel where c_metric_id in (:metric_ids)
sql.t_moni_metric_base.delete: DELETE FROM t_moni_metric_base WHERE c_id in (:ids)
sql.t_moni_metric_base.select_by_condation: SELECT * FROM (SELECT metric.c_id AS metricId,metric.c_name AS metricName,metric.c_unit AS metricUnit,metric.c_data_type AS dataType,metric.c_metric_type AS metricType,metric.c_is_custom AS isCustom,metric.c_user_id AS metricUser,grouprel.c_metric_group_id AS groupRelId,GROUP_CONCAT(mgroup.c_name) AS groupName,GROUP_CONCAT(mgroup.c_id) AS groupId FROM t_moni_metric_base AS metric,t_moni_metric_group_rel AS grouprel,t_moni_metric_group AS mgroup WHERE  metric.c_id = grouprel.c_metric_id AND mgroup.c_id = grouprel.c_metric_group_id  GROUP BY metric.c_id) temp
sql.t_moni_metric_base_metric_type.select: SELECT c_metric_type FROM t_moni_metric_base GROUP BY c_metric_type
sql.t_moni_metric_group.select: SELECT c_id as groupId,c_name as groupName,c_desc as groupDesc, c_is_custom as isCustom FROM t_moni_metric_group
sql.t_moni_metric_group.delete: DELETE FROM t_moni_metric_group WHERE c_id in (:groupIds)
sql.t_moni_metric_group_by_id.select: SELECT c_id as groupId,c_name as groupName,c_desc as groupDesc FROM t_moni_metric_group WHERE c_id=?
sql.t_moni_metric_base_by_id.select: SELECT metric.c_id AS metricId,metric.c_name AS metricName,metric.c_unit AS metricUnit,metric.c_data_type AS dataType,metric.c_metric_type AS metricType,metric.c_desc AS metricDesc,metric.c_is_custom AS isCustom,metric.c_user_id as metricUser,grouprel.c_metric_group_id AS groupRelId,grouprel.c_metric_id AS metricId,group_concat(mgroup.c_name) AS groupName,group_concat(mgroup.c_id) AS groupId FROM t_moni_metric_base AS metric,t_moni_metric_group_rel AS grouprel,t_moni_metric_group AS mgroup WHERE  metric.c_id = grouprel.c_metric_id AND mgroup.c_id = grouprel.c_metric_group_id AND metric.c_id=?
sql.t_moni_model_base.selectById: SELECT DISTINCT (modelMetricRel.c_metric_id) AS metricId,metricBase.c_name AS metricName,metricBindle.c_is_instance AS isInstance,metricBindle.c_is_initvalue  AS isInitValue,metricBindle.c_is_displayname  AS isDisplayName,SUBSTRING(modelMetricRel.c_model_id,1,8) AS modelId,collectCommand.c_protocol AS coltProtocol FROM t_moni_model_metric_rel AS modelMetricRel,t_moni_metric_base AS metricBase,t_moni_metricbinding AS metricBindle, t_moni_cmd AS collectCommand,t_moni_cmds_group AS collectCommandGroup WHERE modelMetricRel.c_model_id = ? AND metricBase.c_id = modelMetricRel.c_metric_id AND metricBindle.c_metric_id = modelMetricRel.c_metric_id  AND collectCommandGroup.c_metricbinding_id = metricBindle.c_id AND collectCommand.c_cmds_group_id = collectCommandGroup.c_id AND collectCommand.c_protocol IN ('SNMP','WMI','JDBC')
sql.t_moni_model_base.selectMetricInfo: SELECT DISTINCT (modelMetricRel.c_metric_id) AS metricId,metricBase.c_name AS metricName,metricBase.c_desc AS metricDescr,metricBase.c_metric_type AS metricType,metricBase.c_unit AS metricUnit,metricBase.c_data_type AS metricDataType,metricGroupRel.c_metric_group_id AS metricGroupId,metricBindle.c_is_instance  AS isInstance,metricBindle.c_is_initvalue  AS isInitValue,metricBindle.c_is_displayname  AS isDisplayName,modelMetricRel.c_model_id AS modelId,collectCommand.c_protocol AS coltProtocol,SUBSTRING(modelMetricRel.c_model_id,1,8) AS modelPrefix FROM t_moni_model_metric_rel AS modelMetricRel,t_moni_metric_base AS metricBase,t_moni_metricbinding AS metricBindle,t_moni_cmd AS collectCommand,t_moni_cmds_group AS collectCommandGroup,t_moni_metric_group_rel AS metricGroupRel WHERE modelMetricRel.c_model_id = ?  AND modelMetricRel.c_metric_id = ? AND metricBase.c_id = modelMetricRel.c_metric_id  AND metricBindle.c_metric_id = modelMetricRel.c_metric_id AND metricBindle.c_model_id = modelMetricRel.c_model_id AND collectCommandGroup.c_metricbinding_id = metricBindle.c_id AND collectCommand.c_cmds_group_id = collectCommandGroup.c_id AND metricGroupRel.c_metric_id = metricBase.c_id
sql.t_moni_model_base.selectCommandPropertie: SELECT collectCommand.c_protocol AS collectProtocol,collectCommand.c_cmd AS collectCmd,commandProperties.c_name AS paramName,commandProperties.c_value AS paramValue FROM  t_moni_metricbinding AS metricBindle,t_moni_cmds_group AS commandGroup,t_moni_cmd AS collectCommand,t_moni_cmd_properties AS commandProperties WHERE  metricBindle.c_model_id =?  AND metricBindle.c_metric_id=?  AND commandGroup.c_metricbinding_id = metricBindle.c_id AND collectCommand.c_cmds_group_id = commandGroup.c_id AND commandProperties.c_cmd_id = collectCommand.c_id
sql.t_moni_model_base.selectSupportPropertie: SELECT cmdSupport.c_version AS sysOID,cmdSupport.c_rel AS sysVersion FROM t_moni_cmds_support AS cmdSupport,t_moni_cmds_group AS cmdsGroup,t_moni_metricbinding AS metricBinding WHERE cmdSupport.c_cmds_group_id = cmdsGroup.c_id AND cmdsGroup.c_metricbinding_id = metricBinding.c_id AND metricBinding.c_model_id = ? AND metricBinding.c_metric_id = ?;
sql.t_moni_metricbinding.update: UPDATE t_moni_metricbinding SET c_is_instance=:isInstance,c_is_initvalue=:isInitvalue,c_is_displayname=:isDisplayname WHERE c_model_id=:modelId AND c_metric_id=:metricId
sql.t_moni_metricbinding.insert: INSERT INTO t_moni_metricbinding(c_id, c_model_id, c_metric_id, c_is_instance, c_is_initvalue, c_is_displayname) VALUES(:id, :modelId, :metricId, :isInstance, :isInitvalue, :isDisplayname)
sql.t_moni_cmd_protocol.update: UPDATE t_moni_cmd SET c_protocol=:collectProtocol  WHERE c_cmds_group_id =:cmdsGroupId
sql.t_moni_cmd.update: UPDATE t_moni_cmd SET c_protocol=:collectProtocol ,c_cmd=:collectCmd  WHERE c_id =:cmdId
sql.t_moni_cmd_group.selectById: SELECT t.c_cmds_group_id FROM t_moni_cmd t,t_moni_cmds_group,t_moni_metricbinding WHERE t.c_cmds_group_id = t_moni_cmds_group.c_id AND t_moni_cmds_group.c_metricbinding_id = t_moni_metricbinding.c_id AND t_moni_metricbinding.c_model_id=? AND t_moni_metricbinding.c_metric_id=?
sql.t_moni_model_metric.select: SELECT t1.*,t2.*,t3.* FROM (SELECT metricBase.c_id AS metricId,metricBase.c_name AS metricName,metricBase.c_metric_type AS metricType,metricBase.c_unit AS metricUnit,metricBase.c_data_type AS metricDataType,metricGroupRel.c_metric_group_id AS metricGroup FROM t_moni_model_metric_rel AS modelMetricRel,t_moni_metric_base AS metricBase,t_moni_metric_group_rel AS metricGroupRel WHERE modelMetricRel.c_model_id = ?  AND metricBase.c_id = modelMetricRel.c_metric_id AND metricGroupRel.c_metric_id = modelMetricRel.c_metric_id) AS t1, (SELECT metricBinding.c_metric_id AS metricId2, metricBinding.c_is_initvalue AS isInitValue,metricBinding.c_is_instance AS isInstance,metricBinding.c_is_displayname AS isDisplayName FROM t_moni_metricbinding AS metricBinding,t_moni_model_metric_rel AS modelMetricRel WHERE modelMetricRel.c_model_id =? AND metricBinding.c_metric_id = modelMetricRel.c_metric_id) AS t2,(SELECT metricBinding.c_metric_id AS metricId3,collectCommand.c_protocol AS collProtocol,SUBSTRING(modelMetricRel.c_model_id, 1, 8) AS modelPrefix,collectCommand.c_cmd AS collCommand,collectCommandProperties.c_name AS commadName,collectCommandProperties.c_value AS commandValue,modelMetricRel.c_res_type_id AS resType FROM t_moni_model_metric_rel AS modelMetricRel,t_moni_metricbinding AS metricBinding,t_moni_cmd AS collectCommand,t_moni_cmds_group AS collectCommandGroup,t_moni_cmd_properties AS collectCommandProperties WHERE modelMetricRel.c_model_id = ?  AND metricBinding.c_metric_id = modelMetricRel.c_metric_id AND collectCommandGroup.c_metricbinding_id = metricBinding.c_id AND collectCommand.c_cmds_group_id = collectCommandGroup.c_id AND collectCommandProperties.c_cmd_id = collectCommand.c_id) AS t3 WHERE t1.metricId = t2.metricId2 AND t3.metricId3 = t1.metricId
sql.t_moni_metric_base_ByModelId.select: SELECT DISTINCT(metricBase.c_id) AS metricId,metricBase.c_name AS metricName,metricBase.c_desc AS metricDescr,metricBase.c_metric_type AS metricType,metricBase.c_unit AS metricUnit,metricBase.c_data_type AS metricDataType,metricGroupRel.c_metric_group_id AS metricGroupId FROM t_moni_model_metric_rel AS modelMetricRel,t_moni_metric_base AS metricBase,t_moni_metric_group_rel AS metricGroupRel WHERE modelMetricRel.c_model_id = ? AND metricBase.c_id = modelMetricRel.c_metric_id AND metricGroupRel.c_metric_id = modelMetricRel.c_metric_id
sql.t_moni_metric_binding_ByModelId.select: SELECT DISTINCT(metricBinding.c_metric_id) AS metricId, metricBinding.c_is_initvalue AS isInitValue,metricBinding.c_is_instance AS isInstance,metricBinding.c_is_displayname AS isDisplayName FROM t_moni_metricbinding AS metricBinding,t_moni_model_metric_rel AS modelMetricRel WHERE modelMetricRel.c_model_id = ? AND metricBinding.c_metric_id = modelMetricRel.c_metric_id
sql.t_moni_cmd_ByModelId.select: SELECT metricBinding.c_metric_id AS metricId,collectCommand.c_protocol AS collProtocol,SUBSTRING(modelMetricRel.c_model_id, 1, 8) AS modelPrefix,collectCommand.c_cmd AS collCommand,collectCommandProperties.c_name AS commadName,collectCommandProperties.c_value AS commandValue,modelMetricRel.c_res_type_id AS resType FROM t_moni_model_metric_rel AS modelMetricRel,t_moni_metricbinding AS metricBinding,t_moni_cmd AS collectCommand,t_moni_cmds_group AS collectCommandGroup,t_moni_cmd_properties AS collectCommandProperties WHERE modelMetricRel.c_model_id =?  AND metricBinding.c_metric_id = modelMetricRel.c_metric_id AND collectCommandGroup.c_metricbinding_id = metricBinding.c_id AND collectCommand.c_cmds_group_id = collectCommandGroup.c_id AND collectCommandProperties.c_cmd_id = collectCommand.c_id AND collectCommand.c_protocol  IN ('SNMP','WMI','JDBC') GROUP BY collectCommand.c_cmd
sql.t_moni_model_metric.selectDetail: SELECT A.*,B.* FROM (SELECT DISTINCT (modelMetricRel.c_metric_id) AS metricId,metricBase.c_name AS metricName,metricBase.c_desc AS metricDescr,metricBase.c_metric_type AS metricType,metricBase.c_unit AS metricUnit,metricBase.c_data_type AS metricDataType,metricGroupRel.c_metric_group_id AS metricGroupId,metricBindle.c_is_instance AS isInstance,metricBindle.c_is_initvalue AS isInitValue,metricBindle.c_is_displayname AS isDisplayName,modelMetricRel.c_model_id AS modelId,collectCommand.c_protocol AS coltProtocol,SUBSTRING(modelMetricRel.c_model_id, 1, 8) AS modelPrefix,collectCommand.c_cmd AS collCommand,collectCommand.c_id AS collCommandId,collectCommandGroup.c_id AS collCommandGroupId,modelMetricRel.c_res_type_id AS resType FROM t_moni_model_metric_rel AS modelMetricRel,t_moni_metric_base AS metricBase,t_moni_metricbinding AS metricBindle,t_moni_cmd AS collectCommand,t_moni_cmds_group AS collectCommandGroup,t_moni_metric_group_rel AS metricGroupRel,t_moni_cmd_properties AS collectCommandProperties WHERE modelMetricRel.c_model_id = ? AND modelMetricRel.c_metric_id = ? AND collectCommand.c_protocol = ? AND metricBindle.c_is_instance =? AND metricBindle.c_is_initvalue =? AND metricBindle.c_is_displayname =? AND metricBase.c_id = modelMetricRel.c_metric_id AND metricBindle.c_metric_id = modelMetricRel.c_metric_id AND metricBindle.c_model_id = modelMetricRel.c_model_id AND collectCommandGroup.c_metricbinding_id = metricBindle.c_id AND collectCommand.c_cmds_group_id = collectCommandGroup.c_id AND metricGroupRel.c_metric_id = metricBase.c_id) AS A LEFT JOIN t_moni_cmd_properties AS B ON B.c_cmd_id = A.collCommandId
sql.t_moni_cmd_properties.update: UPDATE t_moni_cmd_properties SET c_name=:collectName ,c_value=:collectValue WHERE c_cmd_id =:colCmdId
sql.t_moni_cmds_support.selectByModelId: SELECT commandGroup.c_id AS cmdsGroupId , commandSupport.c_version AS sysOID,commandSupport.c_rel AS sysVersion,collectCmd.c_cmd AS collectCmd,commandProperties.c_value AS collectType FROM  t_moni_cmds_group AS commandGroup,t_moni_metricbinding AS metricBinding,t_moni_cmd AS collectCmd,t_moni_cmd_properties AS commandProperties,t_moni_cmds_support AS commandSupport WHERE metricBinding.c_model_id=? AND metricBinding.c_metric_id=? AND commandGroup.c_metricbinding_id = metricBinding.c_id AND collectCmd.c_cmds_group_id = commandGroup.c_id AND collectCmd.c_protocol ='SNMP'AND commandProperties.c_cmd_id = collectCmd.c_id AND commandSupport.c_cmds_group_id = commandGroup.c_id
sql.t_moni_cmds_support.delete: DELETE FROM t_moni_cmds_support WHERE c_cmds_group_id in (:ids)
sql.t_moni_cmds_support.update: UPDATE t_moni_cmds_support SET c_version=:sysOid,c_rel=:sysVersion WHERE c_cmds_group_id=:cmdsGroupId
sql.t_moni_policy_info_selectById: SELECT collPolicy.c_id AS policyId,collPolicy.c_name AS policyName,collPolicy.c_desc AS policyDesc,c_policy_type AS policyType FROM t_moni_policy_info AS collPolicy WHERE c_model_id =?
sql.t_moni_policy_event_selectEventInfor: SELECT eventBase.c_name AS eventName,eventBase.c_name_display AS displayName,eventBase.c_type AS eventType,policyEvent.c_level AS eventLevel,policyEvent.c_in_use AS isInUsed,policyEvent.c_id FROM  t_moni_policy_info AS collPolicy, t_moni_policy_event AS policyEvent, t_moni_event_base AS eventBase WHERE collPolicy.c_model_id =? AND policyEvent.c_policy_id = collPolicy.c_id AND eventBase.c_id = policyEvent.c_event_id
sql.t_moni_policy_metric_select: SELECT allPolicyMetric.*,policyThreshold.c_exp1,policyThreshold.c_exp2,policyThreshold.c_exp3 FROM (SELECT collPolicy.c_id AS policyId,metricBase.c_metric_type AS metricType,metricGroupRel.c_metric_group_id AS metricGroupId,metricBase.c_name AS metricName,policyMetric.c_flapping AS metricFlapping,policyMetric.c_time_out AS collectTimeOut,policyMetric.c_retry_times AS collectRetry,policyMetric.c_frequency_id AS collectFrequency,policyMetric.c_in_use AS isInUsed,policyMetric.c_gen_event AS isGenEvent,policyMetric.c_metric_id AS metricId FROM t_moni_policy_info AS collPolicy,t_moni_metric_base AS metricBase,t_moni_metric_group_rel AS metricGroupRel,t_moni_policy_metric AS policyMetric  WHERE collPolicy.c_model_id =?  AND metricGroupRel.c_metric_id = policyMetric.c_metric_id  AND policyMetric.c_policy_id = collPolicy.c_id  AND metricBase.c_id = policyMetric.c_metric_id) allPolicyMetric LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM t_moni_policy_threshold WHERE c_policy_id IN (SELECT c_id FROM t_moni_policy_info WHERE c_model_id =? )) AS policyThreshold ON allPolicyMetric.metricId = policyThreshold.c_metric_id GROUP BY metricId
sql.t_moni_policy_metric_update: UPDATE t_moni_policy_metric policyMetric SET policyMetric.c_flapping=?,policyMetric.c_time_out=?,policyMetric.c_retry_times=?,policyMetric.c_frequency_id=?,policyMetric.c_in_use=?,policyMetric.c_gen_event=? WHERE policyMetric.c_policy_id=? AND policyMetric.c_metric_id=?
sql.t_moni_policy_threshold_update: UPDATE t_moni_policy_threshold policyThreshold SET policyThreshold.c_exp1=?,policyThreshold.c_exp2=?,policyThreshold.c_exp3=? WHERE policyThreshold.c_policy_id=? AND policyThreshold.c_metric_id=?
sql.t_moni_policy_event_update: UPDATE t_moni_policy_event policyEvent SET policyEvent.c_level=?,policyEvent.c_in_use=? WHERE policyEvent.c_id=?
sql.t_moni_policy_info_update: UPDATE t_moni_policy_info SET c_id=?,c_name=?,c_desc=?,c_policy_type=? WHERE c_model_id=?
sql.t_moni_cmd.selectGroupId: SELECT c_cmds_group_id FROM t_moni_cmd WHERE c_id =?
